settings.text: It's NOT just a T-shirt. Our premium tees are designed for guys’ bodies. They accentuate the arms & shoulders to make you stand out and feel great. They're also super soft, wash well and reasonably priced.

settings.question: ABOUT THIS COLLECTION
settings.paragraph:
True Classic® activewear shirts provide moisture wicking, quick dry, and odor control features. Every activewear shirt is crafted with a blend of quality polyester and spandex for the ultimate multi-stretch comfort. Plus, True Classic® activewear shirts include UPF 30, blocking 97% of UV radiation and/or UV rays on those extra sunny days.

Men’s Activewear Shirts True Classic® activewear shirts are available in a wide range of colors including black, charcoal heather gray, heather navy, heather light gray, heather indigo, and heather military green. Every activewear shirt comes with a signature classic side seam offering the best look and fit.

You can choose from our collection of active crew neck tees for casual style with all the comfort. Our heather staple active crew neck t-shirt 6-pack is a popular pick featuring six colors, minimal-shrink fabric, and soft screen-printed tags so you can focus on being active.

How to Style Your Activewear You can pair a True Classic® active polo with any of our chino pants and shorts for a casual, professional aesthetic. For work from home days, game days, and every day in between, our active crew neck tees look great with any of our men’s joggers. Browse our collection of True Classic® activewear shirts to find the perfect match.
